creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: short vest, open on PL side with buttons and hooks for closure; rounded neckline; green velvet front panel embroidered in central V with thick black threads in organic plant motifs; backing in blue with yellow and black stripes; front lined in blue; back lined in grey
medium: Velvet, cotton, silk, buttons, hooks and eyes
title: Vest (sidriye)
